top_stories.title: Five killed in Jerusalem shooting attack, paramedics say
top_stories.description: Israeli police say two gunmen were "neutralised" after the attack at a bus stop, in which seven other people were seriously wounded.

top_stories.title: New Zealand dad shot dead by police after years on the run with children
top_stories.description: Tom Phillips disappeared with his three children in 2021 after losing a custody battle.

top_stories.title: Australian triple murderer jailed for life over toxic mushroom lunch
top_stories.description: She will serve a non-parole period of 33 years for killing three relatives and trying to kill another.

top_stories.title: Trump threatens tougher sanctions after Russia's heaviest strikes on Ukraine
top_stories.description: Trump's threat of sanctions comes after Russia's heaviest attack of the war.

top_stories.title: South Korean worker tells BBC of panic during US immigration raid at Hyundai plant
top_stories.description: Some 400 US agents took part in the immigration raid on the Hyundai facility, detaining hundreds of workers, many South Korean nationals.

quick_reads.title: France is set to vote out another PM. Can anything break its political deadlock?
quick_reads.description: François Bayrou called a vote of confidence in himself after nine relatively ineffectual months in office.

quick_reads.title: 'Suitcase murder' trial begins in New Zealand
quick_reads.description: Hakyung Lee is accused of killing her two young children, whose bodies were found stuffed in suitcases.

quick_reads.title: Palestinian prisoners not being given adequate food, Israel top court says
quick_reads.description: The court said the state is legally obligated to provide enough food to ensure "a basic level of existence."

quick_reads.title: Ryan Routh to stand trial for alleged Trump assassination attempt
quick_reads.description: A court case for Mr Routh, who has pleaded not guilty, begins on Monday - with the defendant representing himself.

quick_reads.title: Argentine rights activist Rosa Roisinblit dies aged 106
quick_reads.description: A leading member of the Grandmothers of Plaza de Mayo, she helped convict men who abducted hundreds of babies.

top_stories.title: InDrive has big plans to become a global ‘super app’ where others have failed
top_stories.description: InDrive plans to expand into multiple verticals over the next 12 months across its top markets, starting with grocery deliveries in Kazakhstan.

top_stories.title: Uber and Momenta to test autonomous vehicles in Germany in 2026
top_stories.description: Momenta is one of 20 global AV partners that Uber has scooped up across its ridehail, delivery, and freight businesses. Uber says those partnerships have already generated an annualized rate of 1.5 million mobility and delivery.

top_stories.title: Microsoft says Azure affected after cables cut in the Red Sea
top_stories.description: It's not clear who cut the cables or why.

top_stories.title: Are bad incentives to blame for AI hallucinations?
top_stories.description: How can a chatbot be so wrong — and sound so confident in its wrongness?

top_stories.title: Koah raises $5M to bring ads into AI apps
top_stories.description: One investor says Koah is "building the essential monetization layer for consumer AI."

quick_reads.title: Hyundai’s eVTOL startup Supernal pauses work following CEO and CTO departures
quick_reads.description: The shakeup comes as the startup was still struggling to get its test vehicle off the ground -- literally. The first flight was only in March.

quick_reads.title: What is Mistral AI? Everything to know about the OpenAI competitor
quick_reads.description: Mistral AI, the French company behind AI assistant Le Chat and several foundational models, is officially regarded as one of France’s most promising tech startups and is arguably the only European company that could compete with OpenAI. It is reportedly in the process of raising another round that would value it at $14 billion, up […]

quick_reads.title: Porsche’s insanely clever hybrid engine comes to the 911 Turbo S
quick_reads.description: The new 911 variant is 14 seconds quicker around the Nürburgring Nordschleife.
